resources.string: Home page displays the root navigation to the screens mentioned. One can also navigate using the provided Navigation Drawer (Swipe from left-edge).
Launches Equalizer Settings of the App
Albums page displays a list of Albums available, with their Title and Album Cover.
Launches SearchView to enable user to Search for an Album
Album Detail page displays the Album information and its Songs. User can click on any Song to play and also queue them for listening.
Starts a New Play Queue with all the list of Songs shown
Adds the selected song to the current Play Queue
Shows a Popup Menu for More Actions like Share, Add to Playlist, Delete Track, etc.
User is presented with a choice of Playlists to enqueue this Album into…
Songs page displays a list of Songs available, with their Album Cover, Title and Artist Names. User can click on any Song to play and also queue them for listening.
Starts a New Play Queue with all the list of Songs shown
Adds the selected song to the current Play Queue
Shows a Popup Menu for More Actions like Share, Add to Playlist, Delete Track, etc.
Launches SearchView to enable user to Search for a Song
Artists page display a list of Artists available, with their Number of Albums. Clicking on any will show the Albums and Songs of the Artist.
Launches SearchView to enable user to Search for an Artist
Artist Detail page displays the list of Albums of the Artist available along with the Songs of the Artist in each Album. User can click on any Song to play and also queue the Albums for listening.
Starts a New Play Queue with all the list of Songs shown
Adds the songs of this Album to the current Play Queue
Shows a Popup Menu for More Actions like Share, Add to Playlist, Delete Album, etc.
Artist\'s Songs are added to \"My Favorites\" playlist
Artist\'s Songs are removed from \"My Favorites\" playlist
User is presented with a choice of Playlists to enqueue the Songs of this Artist into…
Deletes this Artist\'s Albums and Songs from storage
Playlists page displays a list of User Playlist and Smart Playlist available. Clicking on any will show the Songs queued in the corresponding Playlist.
Launches SearchView to enable user to Search for a Playlist
Playlist detail page displays a list of Songs queued in the Playlist. User can click on any Song to play and also reorder them in the play queue.
Starts to Play all the list of Songs queued in the Playlist
Allows to reorder the Track items in the Playlist queue
Saves the changes done to the existing Playlist
Saves the current temporary Play Queue list with the given Name
Launches an Activity to Search and Pick Songs into the Playlist
Jukebox page displays a list of available Jukeboxes which are online radio channels. Clicking on any will show the Songs available in the corresponding Jukebox.
Launches SearchView to enable user to Search for a Jukebox
Jukebox Detail page displays the Jukebox information and its Songs. User can click on any Song to play and listen.

This is a bottom sheet dialog that displays the payment information for listening to the Jukebox. User is required to pay the amount requested to listen to this Jukebox channel. \n\nPayment is carried out via the in-app billing service that connects to the Payment gateways/services like Paypal, Paytm, Razorpay, etc., using the respective APIs to authenticate and capture the amount for the payment transaction being done.
Fake Payment Successful! Enjoy your Jukebox!

This is a bottom sheet that displays the Audio Player and its related controls. Audio Player will show the current Song Track that is being played along with its info like Album, Album Cover and Artists. It has an interactive seekbar that shows the user how much part of the song is already played and can be used to seek to play from a particular point in the track.
Launches Artist Activity with Artist details
Launches Album Activity with Album details
Launches a Web Browser searched for the Song Name to show its related info
App designed and developed by Kaushik N Sanji as part of the project coursework done for the Android Basics Nanodegree course offered by Udacity.

This is a Musical Structure App that showcases a structure for a typical Music Player App without implementing its functionality. Each screen in the App displays a Text describing about the screen and what functionality goes into it. Project mainly focuses on App designing.

All colorful icons used in the App are from Icons8.
